Articles.Content:
For being polite the official 'Hello World!' posting here. Don't panic, /me will show a low posting-frequency, as forums are not entirely 'my thing'. Started to play KSP as it is an affordable way to test out what one has learned and overheard all the years as a space-addict.

So I wish you good launches with only a few unimportant parts falling off, even better landings and godspeed.
Hi there kzauner and welcome to the forums! I'm sure that as a space addict you'll be launching some pretty interesting missions, perhaps you could share your mission reports some day
Welcome and happy launching! Parts falling off isn't critical
Yeah, upload some screenshots. I always like looking at how everyone else plays the game, it's a great source of inspiration. Some call it plagiarism, they would be right
